name: Piyush Kulkarni
review: It is a great Smartwatch from FastrackIt looks very PremiumThe AMOLED display is of great qualityAOD Feature is available thanks to AMOLED SCREENAOD is visible even in direct sunlightBattery life is also amazingCharges quicklyOverall A great product from Fastrack

name: Raghu
review: Pros:Watch is awesome.Battery can last long for 1 week even if it is used for full time.Display is good.Options are good.Bought it for 1990 Rs.Good look at wrist.You can answer a call and talk over a watch itself.Cons:Connectivity between phone app and watch frequently disconnects.Steps count accuracy to be improved.
title: FS2 review

name: Dhruv Sahu
review: Overall the watch is good, but what I didn't liked about this watch is that, it can store only 5 watch faces, there are around 100 watch faces on the cloud, but you can store only any five in the watch i mean smartwatch which cost around 800 900 can store more than 10 12 watch faces, but even at this price point of 2799 , Fastrack is giving us only 5 watch faces.. which is totally disappointing..
title: Watchfaces only 5

name: Manighandan007
review: The silver design is sleek and the battery life is impressive. It offers the typical features of most smartwatches, including alarm, step tracking and goal-setting for walking. However, like all smartwatches, it’s not 100% accurate in step counting—it adds steps while traveling on metro, buses, or bikes. Overall, it does the job, has a solid build, and even survived in heavy rain.
